name: Fathom Playa Del Carmen Junior Mask and Snorkel - Children to Youths
categories: Playa Del Carmen Junior Mask and Snorkel
description: Let your little fish swim free. This easy-fitting mask will open up a whole new world to young ocean lovers. Durable and easy to use, the snorkel's dry-top design keeps water out even if it's submerged, so that junior snorkellers get a fun-focused floating experience.Quick release 3-way buckles for easy mask adjustment.2-windowed mask in durable polycarbonate for clear viewing.Flexible mask skirt allows leak-resistant fit for smaller faces.Dry-top is submersible and prevents water from splashing in.Wide diameter intake tube for normal breathing.1-way purge valve for fast clearing.
